reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here June 19 through June 25, 2004, and thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The staff, which speaks English better than we speak French, was extremely helpful and courteous. Our room was good sized by European standards, air conditioned and had a wonderful balcony with a table and chairs overlooking the pool area. Everything was clean and nicely decorated. The buffet breakfast is a little pricey, but is convenient and has a great selection to choose from. We did not eat at the restaurant, but chose to walk into town each night for dinner where there are a number of good places to eat. Obernai itself is lovely and in a great location to explore the entire region. We would definitely stay here again if we return to the area.
reviews.title: Great hotel, lovely town
